snippet: The Stryker deal resolves claims by patients who said they were injured by metal debris from a hip replacement.
abstract: Stryker, major producer of artificial hip implants, announces it has reached settlement of thousands of patient lawsuits involving now-recalled all-metal devices; is expected to cost company about $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Stryker deal resolves claims by patients who said they were injured by metal debris from a hip replacement.

headline.main: Stryker Settles Suits by Hip Implant Patients for $1 Billion
headline.print_headline: Stryker Settles Suits by Hip Implant Patients for $1 Billion
